original_text: When I started to speak to Cornelius and his family, the Holy Spirit came down on them. It happened in the same way that he first came down on us at the beginning.
korean_text: 내가 말을 시작할 때에 성령이 그들에게 임하시기를 처음 우리에게 하신 것과 같이 하는지라

sentences.original_text: When I started to speak to Cornelius and his family,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 고넬료와 그의 가족에게 말하기 시작했을 때,

sentences.original_text: the Holy Spirit came down on them.
It happened in the same way
that he first came down on us
